name: Weber, Appellant, v. Schwarzwald Evangelical Lutheran Congregation; Weber v. Schwarzwald Evangelical Lutheran Congregation, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Weber v. Schwarzwald Evangelical Lutheran Congregation

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Nix, JJ.
Mr. Justice Manderino took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Weber, Appellant, v. Schwarzwald Evangelical Lutheran Congregation. Weber v. Schwarzwald Evangelical Lutheran Congregation, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each side to pay own costs.
Mr. Justice Manderino took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: David H. Bolcmd, with him Balmer, Mogel, Speidel & Bolcmd, for appellant at No. 76 and appellee at No. 77.
George B. Eves, for appellant at No. 77 and appellee at No. 76.
casebody.head_matter:
Weber, Appellant, v. Schwarzwald Evangelical Lutheran Congregation. Weber v. Schwarzwald Evangelical Lutheran Congregation, Appellant.
Argued April 24, 1974.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Nix, JJ.
David H. Bolcmd, with him Balmer, Mogel, Speidel & Bolcmd, for appellant at No. 76 and appellee at No. 77.

July 1, 1974:
